text.div:
West Nile Virus Infection (Tests for West Nile virus IgG or Total Antibody [Quantitative])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    29535-2 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    29537-8 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    29568-3 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Neutralization test

    29779-6 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
    29781-2 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Unspecified specimen
    31700-8 West Nile virus Ab [Units/volume] in Unspecified specimen
    33328-6 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    33329-4 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum
    38997-3 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay
    39555-8 West Nile virus Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    39572-3 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    41194-2 West Nile virus Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay
    41196-7 West Nile virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Body fluid
    41206-4 West Nile virus Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    41224-7 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    41225-4 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Serum
    55380-0 West Nile virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Hemagglutination inhibition
